Mustex: PULL! Wait a minute what am I doing. Mustex
Beast Mode! I think this animal should make a good
beast of burden.

Stallex: Beast Mode!

  Rhesus ties a vine around each of their waists and
starts pulling himself (still in robot mode because a
Rhesus monkey couldn't do much better).

OOC: I'm about to start another char as well. How
about a dart that melts into acid if it's not removed
in 3 seconds. Also could you have one of your Maximal
chars get Cutie's signal. Is anyone reading my posts
for him. And by the way he's travelling from what will
be Augusta Ga.. Towards what will be Atlanta Ga. (my
home state).
